seo: Ambari,默认密码,漏洞检测,弱口令
summary: 该插件用于检测Ambari系统是否存在使用默认密码的漏洞，通过发送特定请求并验证响应来确认是否为弱口令配置。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Ambari system has the vulnerability of using default passwords. It confirms whether it is a weak password configuration by sending specific requests and verifying the response.
